  • music technology

Music Technology

You'll have access to cutting-edge recording studios and labs featuring the latest in industry standard hardware and software. Our faculty have experience that covers all areas of the music and audio industry, from engineering and production to performance and composition.

Non-Transfer Associate Degrees

  • Digital audio engineering (AAAS)
  • Electronic midi/music production (AAAS)
  • Music merchandising (AAAS)
  • Performance (AAAS)

Certificates

  • Foundations of electronic music (ST)

Learn More

Get in touch with a Shoreline Advisor to learn more about the music technology program, registering, financial ait, and more.
